meta.title: Tech Fest 2026 | College Events
meta.description: The annual technical festival is back with exciting events like robotics, hackathons, and guest lectures from February 20-22, 2026.

about.title: About The Tech Fest
description: Welcome to the biggest technical extravaganza of the year! Tech Fest 2026 is a three-day celebration of technology, innovation, and engineering prowess. It's a platform for students to showcase their skills, learn from experts, and compete with the best.

Featuring a diverse range of events from intense hackathons and robotics competitions to insightful guest lectures by industry pioneers, Tech Fest has something for every tech enthusiast. Join us to build, learn, and be inspired.

highlights.title: Last Year's Glimpses
highlights.caption: A look back at the innovation and excitement of Tech Fest 2025.

categories.title: RoboWars
categories.description: Build and battle robots in the arena.

guests.name: Dr. Alisha Verma
guests.bio: A leading scientist in satellite communication.

articles.title: Tech Fest 2026 is Here!
articles.excerpt: The annual technical festival is back with more exciting events and competitions.

team.title: Organizing Committee
team.joinText: Want to be a part of the core team? Contact the Tech Club.

questions.question: Can I participate in multiple events?
questions.answer: Yes, you can register for as many events as you like, provided the timings do not clash.

questions.question: Is accommodation provided for outstation participants?
questions.answer: Limited accommodation is available in the college hostels on a first-come, first-served basis. Please check the registration portal for details.

location.title: Event Location
location.address: Various locations across the College Campus
